alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN MORA COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Valmora, or 11 miles southwest of Wagon Mound, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound and Shoemaker. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 372 and 390. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor your preferred media outlets and NOAA Weather Radio for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands
